1.0.1.name: wordpress/places-wp
1.0.1.description:
Places WP is the most popular wordpress plugin to enable places support into your wordpress website/blog. It enables your app to collect users location from HTML based browser's location share property, add meta tags to the page header for better geo tagging.

This plugin store all data into your local database, so you don't have to worry about any external api service or payment. The current version is just a start to journey. We will bring in many advanced features to make your app integrated to geo-location system.
